rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment neutrally describes possibility and events ('may have infected', 'all of whom developed symptoms').
The segment does not contain a question.
The segment reports potential infection and symptoms in contacts and does not contain an explicit calming cue.
The segment does not contain a bare negation or statement of uncertainty/low risk.
The segment states the patient may have infected others who developed symptoms, describing a possibility/finding.
